message: Let's split it evenly. Fair is fair, right?
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a little more this time, but I'm not going to budge much further. Let's get this done.
Getting closer, but I still think I can do better.
I'm starting to get a little worried about inflation here. How about we compromise and split it closer to 50/50?
You're worried about inflation? I'm worried about getting a fair deal. Meet me in the middle... of my range.
I'm really not sure how much longer we can keep going back and forth. I'm willing to split it 45/55, but if you keep rejecting, I think we'll both end up with nothing.
